meanings: lose weight in a short period of time

vlive.korean: 근데 이제 단기간에 많이 먹어버리면 되지. You'd have to eat a lot in a short time. 듣기 View video B1A4 : B1A4 여름 연캉스
vlive.english: You'd have to eat a lot in a short time.

vlive.korean: 옛날처럼 단기간에 빼서 그렇게는 못하겠더라. I can't lose weight fast like before. 듣기 View video BTS : 화개장터 : 필리핀에 오다!
vlive.english: I can't lose weight fast like before.

vlive.korean: 단기간에 4팩 정도? - 언제 이렇게 또... You can make maybe up to four. - When did you make... 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [Replay] MONSTA X [THE CONNECT] COMEBACK SHOW
vlive.english: You can make maybe up to four. - When did you make...

vlive.korean: 단기간에 어디를 다녀오는 게 싫어요. not going somewhere for a short period of time. I don't like that. 듣기 View video Cookat X Idol : [매떠여 Super Junior] 강릉편-본편#2
vlive.english: not going somewhere for a short period of time. I don't like that.

vlive.korean: 저희 되게 많은 걸 단기간에 해냈잖아요. -맞아요. We've done many things in a short time. - That's right. 듣기 View video STAREMPIRE : 아이비아이(I.B.I) 깜짝 V앱! '몰래몰래~'
vlive.english: We've done many things in a short time. - That's right.

examples.korean: Snap chat is an ephemeral photo sharing application. 발음듣기 스냅챗은 단기간 사진을 공유하는 앱이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Snap chat is an ephemeral photo sharing application. 발음

examples.korean: It was a stressification for me to write a report in a short time. 발음듣기 단기간에 보고서를 작성하는 것이 나에게는 스트레스 발생이었다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: It was a stressification for me to write a report in a short time. 발음

examples.korean: She is coining it from running a restaurant. 발음듣기 그녀는 식당을 해서 단기간에 큰돈을 번다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: She is coining it from running a restaurant. 발음

examples.korean: You can’t master English in such a short time. 발음듣기 그렇게 단기간으로는 영어를 익힐 수가 없다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can’t master English in such a short time. 발음

examples.korean: That answer is based solely on short-term studies. 발음듣기 그 대답은 단지 단기간의 연구에 기반을 둔거야. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That answer is based solely on short-term studies. 발음
